  return {
    views: [

        path: "/demo",

ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šä»¥ Service è£…é¥°å™¨çš„è·¯å¾„å‚æ•°è§£ææˆå¯¹è±¡åˆå¹¶åœ¨ service ä¸­ã€‚

    return this.request({
      url: "t1",
    });
  }
}

store â€‹

ä½¿ç”¨ Pinia çš„æ¨èå†™æ³•ï¼š

ts
import { defineStore } from "pinia";
import { ref } from "vue";

export const useTestStore = defineStore("test", function () {
  const count = ref<number>(0);

  function add() {
    count.value += 1;
  }

  return {
    count,
    add,
  };
});

ä½¿ç”¨

ts

test.add();

console.log(test.count); // 1

  • onLoad æ¨¡å—å®‰è£…æ—¶è§¦å‘ï¼Œé¢„å…ˆåŠ è½½æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¦‚èœå•é…ç½®ã€ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

    1. ä½¿ç”¨ await ç­‰å¾…åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåå¾€ä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œ

    2. å¯å¾€ä¸‹æ¨¡å—å¯¼å‡ºæŸä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å’Œå˜é‡ï¼Œå¦‚ hasToken éªŒè¯æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ç™»é™†

ts
import { ModuleConfig } from "/@/cool";
import { Vue } from "vue";

export default (): ModuleConfig => {
  return {
    async onLoad() {
      const { user, menu } = useStore();

      if (user.token) {
        // è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
        user.get();
        // è·å–èœå•æƒé™
        await menu.get();
      }

      return {
        async hasToken(cb: () => Promise<any> | void) {
          if (user.token) {
            if (cb) await cb();
          }
        },
      };
    },
  };
};

å…¶ä»–æ¨¡å—ä¸­æ¥æ”¶ hasToken æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

ts
import { ModuleConfig } from "/@/cool";
import { useDict } from "./index";

export default (): ModuleConfig => {
  return {
    onLoad({ hasToken }) {
      const { dict } = useDict();

      hasToken(() => {
        dict.refresh();
      });
    },
  };
};

è¯¥æ¨¡å—éœ€è¦å¯¹å¤–å¼€æ”¾çš„å˜é‡åŠæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿äºåˆ«äººç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š

    // è‡ªå®šä¹‰å˜é‡

      description: "æ•°æ®æè¿°",
